name: CouponAlbum.com
overview: Online coupons for many have become necessary to weather tough economic times. CouponAlbum CEO Vik Mehta says, â€œSince November, consumers are online longer, and we’re seeing more visits and transactions. Increasingly, consumers are opting for online solutions to increase value and lower costs for everyday essentials. Consumers seek the best coupons and are frustrated when a coupon fails to give the correct discount at checkout. CouponAlbum avoids this by performing a continuous code check and validation algorithm. Since its 2006 launch CouponAlbum has provided 20,000+ online and printable coupons that are continuously updated.
